alert.note: Alert for Aguila Valley; Tonopah Desert (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 27 at 12:32PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Maricopa County through 115 PM MST... At 1231 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles southwest of Circle City, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Surprise and White Tank Mountain Park. This includes US Highway 60 between mile markers 130 and 133. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
